name: Magnamon
effect: ＜Blocker＞＜Armor Purge＞ (When this Digimon would be deleted, you may trash the top card of this Digimon to prevent that deletion.)[When Digivolving] Unsuspend this Digimon, and it gets +2000 DP until the end of your opponent's next turn for each card with [Armor Form] in its traits in your trash.
